ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
@put:{n:".cataloginfo h3@text",
a:".infotype p[0]@a@text",
c:".infotype p[1]@text&&.infotype p[2]@text",
l:".infotype p[3]@a@text",
d:".intro p@text",
i:".pic img@src",
t:"text.章节目录@href||text.查看全部章节@href"}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
##\s.*\》作者：*
*|\s上一章
*|\s下一章
*|\s返回目录
*|\s加入书签
*

header:

"x-requested-with": "mark.via",

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
d=java.getElements(".list div");
var li="";
for(i in d){
	li+=d.select(`[data-cpage=${i}] li`);
	li+="\n";
	}
	li;
</js>
